original_text: As for the other events of the reign of Jehoahaz, all he did and his achievements, are they not written in the book of the annals of the kings of Israel?
korean_text: 여호아하스의 남은 사적과 행한 모든 일과 그의 업적은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: As for the other events of the reign of Jehoahaz
sentences.korean_translation: 여호아하스 통치 기간의 다른 사건들에 관하여는

sentences.original_text: in the book of the annals of the kings of Israel?
